channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Waymo experimenting with generative AI, but exec says LiDAR and radar sensors important to self-driving safety ‘under all conditions’
item.description: Waymo is experimenting with generative AI, but its current approach is a stark contrast to one of its newer rivals, Tesla.

item.title: Air Force tightens rules on transgender airmen; supporters say it prioritizes readiness: report
item.description: Air Force boards must recommend separation once criteria are met in transgender cases; supporters cite unit cohesion and efficiency, the AP reported.

item.description: "We had an extremely productive meeting, and many points were agreed to and there are just a very few that are left."
